ai-tha-ap116:1.1_0: “Only by name or by the running back,
ai-tha-ap116:1.2_0: I am a King of the gods,
ai-tha-ap116:2.1_0: for the Buddha, the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap116:2.3_0: for the sake of all beings,
ai-tha-ap116:3.1_0: is because of what is seen,
ai-tha-ap116:3.3_0: it is like the In front of the Buddha:
ai-tha-ap116:3.4_0: I attended to the supreme Buddha.
ai-tha-ap116:4.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap116:5.1_0: like travelling stuck in the with arrow.
ai-tha-ap116:6.2_0: May they live together and be each other
ai-tha-ap116:6.3_0: Someone with both virtue and wisdom
ai-tha-ap116:6.4_0: the sway of rebirth in this or that state,
ai-tha-ap116:7.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap116:7.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap116:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgiya.
ai-tha-ap116:11.1_0: anyone more than one day, the Elders (saying):
